actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; International Trade Commission; Office of U.S. Trade Representative; Treasury Department; State Department; Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure H.R. 4566 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to continue until the close of September 30, 1985, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend until June 30, 1985, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.

titles.title: A bill to continue until the close of September 30, 1985, the existing suspension of duties on color couplers and coupler intermediates used in the manufacture of photographic sensitized material.
